main event: A sole civilian witness observed a bright satellite over Courcelles, Belgium on 13 August 1965.
interesting points: The observation lasted for almost 2 minutes with a clear, luminous object seen clearly due to perfect visibility conditions., The object was moving from Southwest to Northeast at a considerable speed, resembling the speed of Echo II., The witness recalled a prayer just before the sighting, expressing a desire to see a flying saucer., No special maneuvers were observed during the flight of the object., The sky was almost clear with a barometric inclination towards rain.
